overview: If you’re looking for four of the most stunning and gorgeous girls the industry has to offer then you’ve come to the right place, Private Specials, Lovely Lassies 2 brings you four scenes with the incredible Alyssa Reece and Amaris alongside debutant Talia Mint and porn super star Valentina Nappi. You will not want to miss a single minute of this one, these girls will leave you breathless! Whether it’s a yoga session with Talia, a post jog shower with Alyssa or a photo at the beach with Amaris, these beauties take every opportunity to get horny and have a real good time. And let’s not forget the return of the great Valentina, an irresistible brunette and experienced star who enjoys an unforgettable anal scene. Private Specials, Lovely Lassies 2, do not miss it!
title: Lovely Lassies 2
